name: 10 oz. Candle Package
description:
Make this Spring season special with our new candle package. Enjoy our mixture of citrus and blended vanilla scents as they fill your home with light, pleasant aromas. All of our candles are tripled scented and lead-free. Each 10 ounce candle will last up to 60 hours and the scents continue to linger throughout your room long after they are extinguished. The included candle snuffer will help any candle lover avoid the problems associated with blowing hot wax. This package makes a perfect gift for any occasion.

Package Includes:
10oz Vanilla Cream
10oz Raspberry Lemonade
10oz Coconut Lime Verbena
Dangling Bell Snuffer

name: Men's Outdoor Package
description: Show the man in your life how much you love and respect all he work he does around the home for you with a new bar-b-que tool set and a roll-up outdoor blanket. The bar-b-que tools include a nice carrying case, 2 skewers, 1 fork, 1 spatula, 1 pair of tongs, 1 brush, and 4 corn holders. The roll-up outdoor blanket folds neatly inside itself and rolls up easily for storage. It secures with a Velcro closure and the attached handles make it easy to carry. It's quite roomy at 53" x 48". The blanket is lined with a vinyl backing to keep him warm and dry while watching outdoor sports.

name: Jewelry Package
description:
Show her you love her with this dazzling jewelry package. The bracelet has been tenderly crafted out of Rhodium and each link inscribed with the word “love” in a different language. Small hearts decorate each of the lovely marcasite earrings and are styled in sterling silver with french wires. A great gift for her; she'll know you care. 

Package Includes:
Round marcasite earrings
Languages of love link bracelet

name: Zibbies Package
description:
These crazy looking collectable critters with unmistakable and inexplicable colorful rubbery spikes growing from the tops of their heads are hard to resist. They're fun to shake, stretch, style or just squeeze and hug! Whether you're buying them for your child or going to give them away as gifts for all the birthday parties your kids attend, the recipient will love to play with each one of these 5 adorable critters! Each Zibbie is approximately 8” in size has super stretchy, Hyper-Flex hair. Plus, SECRET CODE hang tags included with each Zibbie enable interactive fun at www.zibbiezone.com. Ages 3 & up. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - small parts. Not for Children under 3 years.

Package Includes:
Slitherz Zibbie
EllaFunz Zibbie
Snapz Zibbie
Fozzy Zibbie
Frizzle Zibbie

name: Bath & Body Package
description:
Take time to pamper yourself with a fresh, clean scent thanks to our Breeze body wash and hand lotion. Both combine sea minerals with linden blossom, sheer sandalwood, amber and musk to cleanse and moisturize without stripping your skin of essential moisture. Want to spread the crisp, fresh breeze scent throughout your home as well? Light the super long lasting cool breeze candle and give life to your room! 

Package Includes:
Breeze body wash
Body lotion
Cool breeze 10 oz candle
